## OctreeNodeChunk.getNext() method

Next (finer) chunk in the hierarchy, or `null` if this is the finest.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
**Returns:**

[OctreeNodeChunk](doc/markdown/./scene.octreenodechunk.md)

The next `OctreeNodeChunk`<!-- -->, or `null` if none.
